Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Fuel pump bearing wear beyond limits. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 28/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
